meanings.definition: A Mexican dish made with a tortilla filled with cheese and other ingredients, then folded in half and cooked until the cheese melts.
meanings.sent1: I love to make quesadillas for dinner with melted cheese inside.
meanings.sent2: At the party, everyone enjoyed the delicious quesadillas with melted cheese.
meanings.sent3: The quesadillas at the restaurant were so cheesy, they made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her love for quesadillas was like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of sizzling quesadillas filled the kitchen with happiness.
